inventory.commentary: 7Jan08 updated to wn2.1, added a sense and features. ahouston

sense.name: taxation
sense.commentary: TAX[+quantity][+money][+levy][+government] revenue enhancement charge against a citizen's person or property or activity for the support of government
sense.examples: The President promised not to raise taxes. In New Jersey there is no sales tax on food or clothing. The IRS will fine you if you don't pay your taxes on time.

sense.name: a heavy strain or burden
sense.commentary: TAX[+state][+situation][+burdensome] Note: a figurative extension of sense 1
sense.examples: The children's constant interruption is a tax on her concentration. The footnotes and commentary were a heavy tax on the reader's attention to the main text.
